resp = client.indices.create(
    index="test",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "comments": {
                "type": "nested",
                "properties": {
                    "votes": {
                        "type": "nested"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="test",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "title": "Test title",
        "comments": [
            {
                "author": "kimchy",
                "text": "comment text",
                "votes": []
            },
            {
                "author": "nik9000",
                "text": "words words words",
                "votes": [
                    {
                        "value": 1,
                        "voter": "kimchy"
                    },
                    {
                        "value": -1,
                        "voter": "other"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.search(
    index="test",
    query={
        "nested": {
            "path": "comments.votes",
            "query": {
                "match": {
                    "comments.votes.voter": "kimchy"
                }
            },
            "inner_hits": {}
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
